data.title: WESTEND ICT PLC'S SUBSIDIARY DOCUMENTA OY SIGNS A COOPERATION AGREEMENT
data.text: Westend ICT Oyj / Release of a Corporate News, transmitted by DGAP - a company of EquityStory AG. The issuer / publisher is solely responsible for the content of this announcement. ---------------------------------------------------------------------- Westend ICT Plc Press Release August 29, 2008 15:15 Finnish time WESTEND ICT PLC'S SUBSIDIARY DOCUMENTA OY SIGNS A COOPERATION AGREEMENT WITH NORWEGIAN SOFTWARE INNOVATION ASA Documenta Oy, which is a subsidiary fully owned by Westend ICT Plc, and the Norwegian company Software Innovation ASA have signed a cooperation agreement concerning the representation and retail of Software Innovation ASA's 360 document and workflow management system in Finland. This agreement significantly strengthens Documenta's offering and improves the company's competitiveness in public administration and especially in the corporate sector. The Software Innovation product, 360Â°, is an advanced modular system, which combines under information management not only workflow and document management, but also projects, processes and interest group relationships. The parts of the system can function independently when required, but are at their best when closely integrated to each other. The information content to be stored can be modified by using versatile settings and this makes it possible to have field-specific applications without using customer-specific customization. Microsoft SharePoint as the operating environment of the system expands the system to a complete intranet, extranet or Internet portal, if desired. Software Innovation ASA is a leading Nordic software company producing software designed for document and information management and information sharing. For 20 years, the company has served Nordic companies that are leading companies on their fields. Software Innovation ASA employs 540 specialists in Norway, Sweden, Denmark and Finland. The company is listed in the Oslo stock exchange. Documenta Oy is a provider of electronic workflow and document management, quality management and work process intensification solutions. The company offers software, maintenance, operation service and integration solutions for companies and public administration. In addition to its own products, Documenta represents in Finland the Software Innovation ASA workflow and document management solutions and the Group Technologies companies' solutions for email archiving and customer relationship management. For additional information, please contact: CEO Asko Ojanen, Documenta Oy, Tel. +358 207 91 6723 CEO Hannu Jokela, Westend ICT Plc, Tel. +358 207 91 6700 News Source: NASDAQ OMX 29.08.2008 Financial News transmitted by DGAP ---------------------------------------------------------------------- Language: English Issuer: Westend ICT Oyj Finland Phone: Fax: E-mail: Internet: ISIN: FI0009007637 WKN: End of News DGAP News-Service ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
